评论详情: This cute chiffon dress is perfect for summer events or casual wear. The purple color is vibrant and appealing for young girls, and the lightweight chiffon fabric makes it comfortable for warmer weather. The dress is well-made with attention to detail, and the flowy skirt adds a playful touch. It fits true to size, but since it is a chiffon material, it’s a bit delicate, so it may need careful washing. Overall, it’s a lovely choice for a summer dress.
I bought this dress for my granddaughter, I loved the fabric, the tailoring is very good, excellent quality and the color is bright and beautiful. I recommend it 100%

Beautiful well made summer dress. Soft fabric, excellent design and very well made.  My granddaughter saw it hanging in my closet and fell in love! Was supposed to be for a Christmas present. She is so excited to wear it! Soft green, beautiful fit and sizing is appropriate.

Beautifully designed dress, very well made for a girl with a beautiful purple color, wide sleeves and a gathered top. Its manufacturing material is elegant chiffon fabric for flower girl parties. It is light and fresh. My girl looks beautiful on her. I love this dress.

This dress is cute, the fabric is nice and soft, and it's so comfy according to my little. It's true to size, the fit is great and is so flattering for a little. I wish it had pockets for her though, its the only thing this dress is missing.

The Blibean Tween Girls Summer Dress is a perfect choice for the warmer months! Made from lightweight and breathable chiffon, this dress keeps kids comfortable and stylish all day long. The design is both cute and age-appropriate, making it great for various occasions like family gatherings, parties, or casual outings.  The size range (6-15 years) ensures a good fit for tweens, and the flowy fabric allows for easy movement. The quality of the material is impressive—it’s soft, durable, and washes well without fading or shrinking. My daughter loves the fit and the vibrant colors that make her feel confident and fashionable.  If you’re looking for a charming and versatile summer dress for your tween, this one ticks all the boxes. Highly recommended for its comfort, style, and quality!
Very cute! I think this dress is adorable. it fits true to size. It feels nice and seems to be really good quality.

Such an adorable dress. Amazon clothes are hit or miss, but this was definitely a hit. I ordered the green for my oldest daughter, and it was so cute that I ended up ordering the dusty pink for my youngest. My pictures don't do the green justice. The green in person looks just like it's pictured on this seller's page. The dress fits great, and it's super flattering on both of my girls. The material is light and airy, and it comes with a second layer so it isn't see-through. I ordered them because I thought they would be so cute as Easter dresses, and I'm embarrassed to say I ordered Easter dresses in December, but I couldn't pass them up. They'll definitely work as everyday dresses too, but Easter is what crossed my mind when I saw them.

Love this dress!  I couldn’t decide on a color for my daughter, so I went with the cream color one. It gives a rustic style to it, which I’m starting to adore more of 🩷. This dress can be pair up with some pretty brown boots and a nice hat or something similar to your liking.
This dress is super cute. Its stretchy top makes for a comfortable wear. BUT, take note, the neckline is wide.

评论概述: It’s nice in color, material, and style but its not my favorite.
评论详情: Its not my favorite Blibean dress. Its cute, the picture mockup in the listing makes it look cute, but something about it is a little messy and frumpy. I think its the fuzzy polkadots. Its a little big for my 6 year old but its the same pink color as all the other dusty pink blibean dresses i buy. Its light and soft material, it seems comfortable, its much nicer than their solid polyester dresses so that's a big plus that the material is better quality. It'll be fine for spring but its not going to be the first dress I grab out of the closet. The fuzzy dots were a strange design decision and the dress would be a 10 star without them.

评论概述: Nice dress.  Which side is the front?
评论详情: This is a nice dress that is sized appropriately.  Our daughter is 6 years old but looks like a full 7 year old and we got the 6-7 year old size.  Fits her perfectly.  The fabric is strong and hefty; doesn't feel too light.  There are no tags on the dress that we received so we don't know which is the front and which is the back and they look so similar, I'm not sure if it's just fully reversible, but it'd be nice to have something showing us which side is supposed to be the back of the dress.
This is a beautiful little dress. I appreciate the range of sizes. The dress has lots of pretty little details that my daughter loves. The sizing was spot on, too.

评论概述: Very cute. Soft fabric and cute slowing style. Love the little dots.
评论详情: Ordered this dress for our daughter and she loves the color, the fit, the softness, and the textured dots. Fluffy sleeves are fun and the smocked waist. Just darling.
It was a nice, conservative dress for my 11 year old daughter.  She really liked it and it seemed comfortable, it looked good on her and it was not revealing at all.
It's giving a very clean money green vibe. The sleeves are a little more off the shoulder than expected. I'm very pleased with the length though. I highly recommend!

This dress is so adorable and pretty. It was the perfect fit and the quality was good. The material is soft and light and such a great fit. If you are looking for a church dress or a cute dress for spring this is a good one and the shipping was really fast.
This is a cute dress that has a vintage look. The material is soft and lightweight. The size was perfect.

This dress is really cute! I can't wait for the spring for my daughter to wear it! It's lightweight. I love the smocked bodice, giving the dress shape. The chiffon circles give the dress texture. Fits good. Will look perfect with a lightweight shawl.
This dress is really beautiful and great quality. Fits as expected and the material is really soft and comfortable.
This dress quality is great. I love how beautiful it is. It is the perfect size and a great dress for the price.

TLDR: Overall, this is a wonderful little summer dress for a very reasonable price. It is very comfortable and well made. It's nice enough to wear to nice places or casual enough to wear to a BBQ.  This little dress is so cute on my little one! The fit of the dress is great, stretchy in the torso so it will fit your kids as they grow. The material is a very light cotton on the outside with a polyester slip on the inside. It is very comfortable and fits very well. The dress is nice enough that you can easily wear it to church but casual enough that you could wear it out for a day trip or to a summer party/BBQ. The length is below the knee on my LO but I suspect we're in for a growth spurt soon and will probably be close to knee high.
Very pretty color. Nice, light jersey material.  Sizing is true to size.
